            @NotNull VarKey key,
            @NotNull
            @NotNull String id,
            @NotNull
            @NotNull Value listener)

        key - the name of the variable
        id - an id to associate with this listener
        listener - the Value object to be notified

      • pure

        boolean pure​()
        Is this scope a 'pure' scope, pure in the sense of pure functions. Pure scopes are created using the 'pure' operator.
        Returns:
        true if this is a pure scope

        @Nullable
@Nullable Scope scopeForKey​(@NotNull
                            @NotNull VarKey key)
        Find which ancestor scope, or this scope, that contains a variable with the name.
        Parameters:
        key - name of the variable.
        Returns:
        the Scope associated with the variable or null of none found

      • set

        @NotNull
@NotNull Variable set​(@NotNull
                      @NotNull VarKey key,
                      @NotNull
                      @NotNull Value value,
                      @Nullable
                      @Nullable Value constraint,
                      @Nullable
                      @Nullable SubType subType,
                      @NotNull
                      @NotNull VarFlags varFlags)
        Creates or updates a variable.
        Parameters:
        key - the name of the variable
        value - the value to assign
        constraint - an optional constraint on this variable that will be checked on assignment
        subType - an optional subtype for the variable
        varFlags - a set of flags relating to the variable
        Returns:
        the variable definition

@Nullable String source​()

        Returns:

        Returns:

      • variables

@NotNull Map<VarKey,Variable> variables​()
